local_intent: Execute the primary long push of the T-block toward the goal along +Y after confirming visibility and aligning yaw=0, then dwell briefly.
assumptions: Contact and lateral alignment were achieved in prior steps
Goal direction corresponds to direction_deg=90 in this scene
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT step: visibility fallback -> set yaw 0 -> long push (0.2 @ 90deg) -> brief wait.
